attributes.action: Should be able to use pre pay Oyster on all above ground trains while in london
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment you cannot use national rail services with a prepay oyster only oyster travelcard, for example traveling from ealing to paddington, chiswick to waterloo etc. and therefore must buy a seperate ticket. Petitions to be able to use these oyster cards that we were forced to adapt to on ALL London Transport. Saving ourselfs time and money, and allowing more people to use mainline trains.
